title: What are your favorite Fall Out Boy lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think Fall Out Boy has some of the best lyrics out there! What A Catch, Donnie “I will never end up like him; behind my back I already am.” Miss Missing You “Sometimes before it gets better, the darkness gets bigger, the person you’d take a bullet for is behind the trigger.” Alone Together “I don’t know where you’re going, but do you got room for one more troubled soul? I don’t know where I’m going, but I don’t think I’m coming home.” 20 Dollar Nose Bleed “Have you ever wanted to disappear?” (Coffee’s For Closers) “I will never believe in anything again.” The Kids Aren’t Alright “And in the end, I’ll do it all again, I think you’re my best friend. Don’t you know that the kids aren’t alright.” and of course: “HEAVY METAL BROKE MY *DUN DUN* HEART”

Not in particular order. I just type what comes up my mind first. When it comes to a “favourite” lyric, I always see lyrics that relates back to my life. “I’m a loose bolt of a complete machine” - Disloyal Orders of Water Buffaloes“You are my favourite ‘what if’, you are my best ‘I’ll never know” - Fourth Of July“I know this whole damn city thinks they need you, but not as much as I do” - The Last of the Real Ones“You say please don’t ever change, but you don’t like me the way I am” - Sunshine Riptide“You are what you love, not who loves you” - Save Rock and Roll“But the only ring I want buried with me are the ones around my eyes” - It’s Hard To Say I Do, When I Don’t“I wanna scream I love you from the top of my lungs, but I’m afraid that someone else will hear me” - The (Shipped) Gold Standard“Last year’s wishes are this year’s apologies” - I'm Like A Lawyer With The Way I'm Always Trying To Get You Off (Me & You)“Oh yeah I’ve got friends who are stars, but some are just black holes” - 27“Say my name and his’ in the same breath, I dare you to say they taste the same” - I Don’t Care
